description.text: Your skill with lighter weapons allows you to wield one alongside your net.

sections.Benefit: You can treat a net as a one-handed ranged weapon, allowing you to wield a light or one-handed melee weapon and still make ranged attacks with your net. When you use your light or one-handed melee weapon to attack an entangled opponent, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls and on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.
sections.Normal: A net is a two-handed ranged weapon.
